item.title: Chip giants Nvidia and AMD to pay 15% of sales revenue in China to US
item.description: The chip giants will hand revenues to the US government in exchange for licences to export to China.

item.title: UN condemns targeted Israeli attack that killed five Al Jazeera journalists
item.description: Israel says it targeted correspondent Anas al-Sharif, accusing him of leading a Hamas cell, which Al Jazeera denies.

item.title: Colombian Senator Miguel Uribe dies two months after being shot
item.description: Miguel Uribe has died of injuries he sustained in a targeted attack on his life at a rally in June.

item.title: Man jumps on to moving high-speed train
item.description: The man was left behind after apparently taking advantage of a scheduled stop to have a cigarette.

item.title: Dozens of Malian soldiers arrested over alleged coup plot against junta, sources say
item.description: The wave of arrests reflect increased tensions within the military government.
